alert.note: Alert for Davidson; Robertson; Sumner; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 28 at 5:20AM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT DAVIDSON...SOUTHERN SUMNER... NORTHWESTERN WILSON AND SOUTHEASTERN ROBERTSON COUNTIES THROUGH 545 AM CDT... At 520 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Millersville to 7 miles northwest of Belle Meade. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Gallatin, Nashville, Madison, Hendersonville, Mount Juliet, Goodlettsville, White House, Millersville, Forest Hills, Oak Hill, Belle Meade, Lakewood, Ridgetop, Cross Plains, Hermitage, Antioch, Old Hickory, Berry Hill, Green Hill, and Bells Bend. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
